form.label: Queue Summary
form.description: View general queue statistics over a duration of time. The default time period is set to: Week to date

search.query: `default_index` | lookup host_lookup.csv host OUTPUT hostname | eval officeNames = if(isnull(hostname),host,hostname) | dedup officeNames | table host, officeNames | sort + host
`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts2$ | eval fqname = q_name+" ("+q_num+")" | dedup q_num | table q_num,fqname | sort + q_name

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts2$ $queues1$ | dedup idcallcent_queuecalls | where isnotnull(q_num) AND (isnull(reason_noanswerdesc) OR reason_noanswerdesc="") AND reason_failcode=0 | stats count
`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts2$ $queues1$ | dedup idcallcent_queuecalls | where isnotnull(q_num) AND reason_noanswerdesc!="" | stats count

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts2$ $queues1$ | dedup idcallcent_queuecalls | where isnotnull(q_num) AND (isnull(reason_noanswerdesc) OR reason_noanswerdesc="") AND reason_failcode != 0 | stats count
`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts2$ $queues1$ | dedup idcallcent_queuecalls | timechart span=1d count BY q_name | rename q_name as Queue, count as "Total Calls"

panel.title: Daily Call Expectancy vs Agent Logins

search.query: `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:call_report" $hosts2$ | dedup call_id, seq_order | eval call_dir = case((dst_type=1 OR dst_type=13), "Outbound", src_type=1, "Inbound", (src_type=0 AND dst_type=0), "Internal") | eval call_start_time = strptime(call_start_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | eval q_num=case(dst_type=4, dst_dn, src_type=4, src_dn) | stats sum(has_queue) as has_queue, first(call_dir) as call_dir, values(q_num) as q_num by call_id, call_start_time | search $queues1$ | where has_queue>0 | eval call_dir=if(isnull(call_dir), "Other", call_dir) | rename call_start_time as _time | timechart span=1h count by call_dir | eval Hour=strftime(_time,"%H") | stats $tkn_aggregation$(*) as * by Hour | append [| search `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:agent_logins" $hosts2$ $queues1$ | dedup ag_num, logintime | where secondsloggedin>$tkn_agent_login_less_than$ | eval starttime=strptime(logintime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%:::z"),endtime=strptime(logouttime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S%:::z") | eval time = mvrange(starttime,endtime,"1h") | mvexpand time | eval _time = time | timechart span=1h count | eval Hour=strftime(_time,"%H") | stats $tkn_aggregation$(count) as Agents_LoggedIn by Hour] | stats first(*) as * by Hour | fillnull Agents_LoggedIn, Inbound, Outbound, Internal value=0 | eval Agents_LoggedIn=if($tkn_aggregation|s$="avg", round(Agents_LoggedIn, 1), Agents_LoggedIn), Inbound=if($tkn_aggregation|s$="avg", round(Inbound, 1), Inbound), Outbound=if($tkn_aggregation|s$="avg", round(Outbound, 1), Outbound), Internal=if($tkn_aggregation|s$="avg", round(Internal, 1), Internal), Other=if($tkn_aggregation|s$="avg", round(Other, 1), Other)

panel.title: Queue Calls Distribution for Queue Agents

search.query: `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:call_report" $hosts2$ | dedup call_id, seq_order | eval call_dir = case((dst_type=1 OR dst_type=13), "Outbound", src_type=1, "Inbound", (src_type=0 AND dst_type=0), "Internal") | eval src_display_name=if(isnull(src_display_name), "N/A", src_display_name) | eval dst_display_name=if(isnull(dst_display_name), "N/A", dst_display_name) | eval q_num=case(dst_type=4, dst_dn, src_type=4, src_dn) | eval agent1=if(dst_type=0, dst_caller_number." - ".dst_display_name, "N/A"), agent2=if(src_type=0, src_caller_number." - ".src_display_name, "N/A"), agent=mvappend(agent1, agent2) | stats sum(has_queue) as has_queue, first(call_dir) as call_dir, values(q_num) as q_num, values(agent) as Agent by call_id | search $queues1$ | where has_queue>0 | eval call_dir=if(isnull(call_dir), "Other", call_dir) | eval Agent=mvfilter(!match(Agent,"N/A")) | mvexpand Agent | search [| search `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:agent_logins" ($queues1$) | dedup ag_num | eval Agent="Ext.".ag_num." - ".ag_fname." ".ag_lname | fields Agent | table Agent] | chart count(call_id) as count over Agent by call_dir | fillnull Inbound, Outbound, Internal value=0

panel.title: All Calls Distribution for Queue Agents

search.query: `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:call_report" $hosts2$ | dedup call_id, seq_order | eval call_dir = case((dst_type=1 OR dst_type=13), "Outbound", src_type=1, "Inbound", (src_type=0 AND dst_type=0), "Internal") | eval src_display_name=if(isnull(src_display_name), "N/A", src_display_name) | eval dst_display_name=if(isnull(dst_display_name), "N/A", dst_display_name) | eval q_num=case(dst_type=4, dst_dn, src_type=4, src_dn) | eval agent1=if(dst_type=0, dst_caller_number." - ".dst_display_name, "N/A"), agent2=if(src_type=0, src_caller_number." - ".src_display_name, "N/A"), agent=mvappend(agent1, agent2) | stats sum(has_queue) as has_queue, first(call_dir) as call_dir, values(q_num) as q_num, values(agent) as Agent by call_id | eval call_dir=if(isnull(call_dir), "Other", call_dir) | eval Agent=mvfilter(!match(Agent,"N/A")) | mvexpand Agent | search [| search `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:agent_logins" ($queues1$) | dedup ag_num | eval Agent="Ext.".ag_num." - ".ag_fname." ".ag_lname | fields Agent | table Agent] | chart count(call_id) as count over Agent by call_dir | fillnull Inbound, Outbound, Internal value=0

panel.title: Call Sequences on the Queue Calls

chart.title: The purpose of the chart is identify how much calls are being transferred internally in the Queue for auditing.

search.query: `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:call_report" $hosts2$ | dedup call_id, seq_order | eval call_dir = case((dst_type=1 OR dst_type=13), "Outbound", src_type=1, "Inbound", (src_type=0 AND dst_type=0), "Internal", 1==1, "Other") | eval dst_display_name=if(isnull(dst_display_name), "N/A", dst_display_name) | eval src_display_name=if(isnull(src_display_name), "N/A", src_display_name) | eval q_num=case(dst_type=4, dst_dn, src_type=4, src_dn) | eval agent1=if(dst_type=0, dst_caller_number." - ".dst_display_name, "N/A"), agent2=if(src_type=0, src_caller_number." - ".src_display_name, "N/A"), agent=mvappend(agent1, agent2) | stats sum(has_queue) as has_queue, list(call_dir) as call_dir, values(q_num) as q_num, values(agent) as Agent by call_id | search $queues1$ | where has_queue>0 $tkn_only_internal_call_seq$ | mvexpand call_dir | eval Agent=mvfilter(!match(Agent,"N/A")) | mvexpand Agent | search [| search `default_index` sourcetype="3cx:agent_logins" ($queues1$) | dedup ag_num | eval Agent="Ext.".ag_num." - ".ag_fname." ".ag_lname | fields Agent | table Agent] | chart count(call_id) as count over Agent by call_dir | fillnull Inbound, Outbound, Internal value=0

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts2$ $queues1$ | eval Queue = q_num+" - "+q_name | eval Ab = if(isserviced="0", 1, 0) | eval Ans = if(isserviced="1", 1, 0) | eval SlaP = if(tot_ringing_sec<=$slatime$,1,0) | stats count as Total, sum(Ab) as Abandoned, sum(Ans) as Answered, sum(tot_servicing_sec) as TotTalk, avg(tot_servicing_sec) as AvgTalk, sum(tot_ringing_sec) as TotRing, avg(tot_ringing_sec) as AvgRing, sum(SlaP) as SlaPc by Queue | eval TotC = [search sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" | stats count as TotalC | return $TotalC ] | eval PctOfCalls = round((Total/TotC)*100,2) . " %" | eval PctOfSLA = round((SlaPc/Total)*100,2) . " %" | eval SvPct = round(Answered*100/Total,1) . " %" | eval TTalk = replace(tostring(TotTalk,"duration"),"\.(\d+)","") | eval TRing = replace(tostring(TotRing,"duration"),"\.(\d+)","") | eval TTalk = replace(TTalk,"(\d*)\+(\d+)\:(\d+)\:(\d+)","\1d \2h \3m \4s") | eval TRing = replace(TRing,"(\d*)\+(\d+)\:(\d+)\:(\d+)","\1d \2h \3m \4s") | eval TTalk = replace(TTalk,"(\d+)\:(\d+)\:(\d+)","\1h \2m \3s") | eval TRing = replace(TRing,"(\d+)\:(\d+)\:(\d+)","\1h \2m \3s") | eval ATalk = strftime(AvgTalk, "%Mm %Ss") | eval ARing = strftime(AvgRing, "%Mm %Ss") | table Queue, Total, Abandoned, Answered, PctOfCalls, SvPct, PctOfSLA, TRing, ARing, TTalk, ATalk | rename Total as "Total Calls", SvPct as "% of Calls Serviced", PctOfSLA as "SLA Met %", TRing AS "Ring Time Total", ARing as "Mean Ring Time", TTalk AS "Talk Time Total", ATalk as "Mean Talk Time", PctOfCalls as "% of Calls Total" | sort + q_num
`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts2$ $queues1$ | dedup idcallcent_queuecalls | timechart span=1d avg($savgs$) BY q_name | rename q_name as Queue

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts2$ $queues1$ | dedup idcallcent_queuecalls | eval SLTime = if(tot_ringing_sec<=$slatime$,"SLA Met","SLA Breached") | chart count AS QCalls by q_name, SLTime span=1d | rename q_name as Queue

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts2$ $queues1$ | dedup idcallcent_queuecalls | where reason_failcode != 0 | rename q_name AS "Queue #" | chart count(time_start) AS "Abandoned # of Calls" by "Queue #" reason_faildesc

`default_index` sourcetype="3cx:queuecalls_view" $hosts2$ $queues1$ | dedup idcallcent_queuecalls | where reason_noanswercode != 0 | rename q_name AS "Queue #" | eval reason_noanswerdesc=case((reason_noanswerdesc="MaxWaitTime"), "Max Wait Time", (reason_noanswerdesc="NoAgents"), "No Agents Signed In", (reason_noanswerdesc="UserRequested"), "User Requested Callback", true(), "IMPOSSIBLE!") | chart count(time_start) AS "Abandoned # of Calls" by "Queue #" reason_noanswerdesc
